info.title: CHIPS for business - Masterpass API
info.description:
*No matter what business you are in, you can use CHIPS to improve your efficiency and lower your costs.*

| Specifications | Version | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Publisher | 1.0 | 2020-02-11 |

## Why use CHIPS™?
* Your money is safe – CHIPS™ uses a regulated vehicle to protect the money in your CHIPS™ acccount
* No monthly fees and no minimum balance required
* No hidden fees – for each payment the fee is presented to you for your authorisation
* No money is ever taken out of your account without your authorisation – e.g. charges, penalties or debit orders
* QR codes created in CHIPS™ can be scanned by users of other mobile payment solutions, including any bank’s Masterpass app, VodaPay, Nedbank Money, FNB Scan-to-Pay, Zapper app and CHIPS™ Money Manager and instaPay apps
* QR codes created by Zapper, SnapScan, CHIPS™ and banks, can be paid with your CHIPS™ apps

Also see : 
* https://chips.co.za/payment-network/index.php/businesses
* http://chips.co.za

## Getting Started 
1. Subscribe to the Payment Network API on the Trustlink API Marketplace.
1. Register at https://merchant.chips.co.za/
2. Register an authorized Device in the miBusiness Portal

---
## Environments
---
### Storefront - Mockup
* No CHIPS™ sign up required.
* No Trustlink Marketplace account required

#### Headers
You can supply any value for the following header fields:
* MarketplaceAPIKey
* apikey
* apisecret

The storefront will generate a token 0000012345. 

---
### Sandbox - CHIPS™ Demo Environment
* CHIPS™ Demo merchant [account](https://tar.int.tlsag.net/mb/app) required. 
* Trustlink Marketplace [account](/component/apiportal/registration) required.
* Access to the Payment QR APIs required
 
#### Headers
* MarketplaceAPIKey - API Key generated in the associated Trustlink Marketplace Application section. 
* apikey - miBusiness: Administration > Device > payNow > <registered device> > API key 

---
### Production
* CHIPs merchant [account](https://merchant.chips.co.za/) required. 
* Trustlink Marketplace [account](/component/apiportal/registration) required.
* Access to the Payment QR APIs required

#### Headers
* MarketplaceAPIKey - API Key generated in the associated Trustlink Marketplace Application section. 
* apikey - miBusiness: Administration > Device > payNow > <registered device> > API key 

---
# Terms and Conditions
---
By using these APIs you agree to the following terms and conditions
1. Trustlink Marketplace Confedential App Terms and Conditions
2. [CHIPS Terms and Conditions](http://www.chips.co.za/downloads/CHIPS_Terms_Conditions_2019-07-25.pdf)
3. [AOS Terms and Conditions](http://www.chips.co.za/downloads/AOS_Terms_and_Conditions_2018-06-26.pdf)
